name: Lack of Portfolio Diversification

image.url: /images/DALLÂ·E 2024-10-03 07.22.30 - A young South African student in a modern study setting, looking concerned but focused while reviewing financial charts on a laptop and smartphone. Th.webp

bio: Concentrating investments in one property or region exposes investors to significant risks, including market downturns, economic changes, and local disasters that can reduce property values and rental income. To mitigate these risks, investors should diversify their portfolios by investing in properties across different regions and sectors. This helps balance potential losses with gains from other areas.
